hue.description: The color of the light. With 0 and 1 being red.

saturation.description: The color saturation. 0 is white, 1 is full color.

brightness.description: The brightness. 0 is off, 1 is full brightness.

temperature.description: The color temperature in kelvins. TODO: Needs max?

transition.description: The time to fade to the new value in milliseconds.
